description:
Lower basement, basement, ground and part four/part seven storey office extension to rear and additional plant enclosure to roof of existing building. 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  Images 1-5; Daylight study dated                         10th August, 2000, 00132/day/01/B;                         02/B; 03/B; 04/B; 05/B' 266-SD.001;                         266.SD.001; 266.PS.01-04;                         266.PA.001-008; 011; 266.PA.001 -                         008; 011; 266.PA.009/A; 010/A; 012/                         A; 013/A; 014/A; 015/A; 266.SK.003-                         004
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed development would have a serious adverse effect on the amenities of occupiers of adjoining property by reason of loss of daylight contrary to policy D2 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan (adopted 1994 and revised 2000 version).
